synopsis.text:
Ye Chen, once an unremarkable disciple, finds himself cast out from his sect and betrayed by those he held dear. When all hope seems lost, a divine flame descends from the heavens, bestowing upon him an unexpected opportunity to traverse the immortal martial arts path. In a world teeming with gods, demons, immortals, and Buddhas, Ye Chen embarks on a chaotic journey to defy the heavens themselves.

Through trials and tribulations, Ye Chen's unwavering determination propels him to the pinnacle of martial arts, rewriting his own destiny. As he ascends to new heights, he vows to prove his worth and exact vengeance on those who once scorned him. Prepare to be enthralled by the captivating tale of Ye Chen's rise from the ashes and his ultimate quest for power and redemption.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
